attributes.action:
No confidence in the government poll,
Boris to resign
attributes.additional_details: Noone trusts or will listen to Boris Johnson any longer
attributes.background: Boris to resign and open up for a general election due to a vote of no confidence in the government

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about honours or appointments, which includes calling for Ministers or MPs to be sacked, resign, or to be subject to a recall vote or a vote of no confidence.

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Hold a general election in December 2021: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/597916
